name: ECOVACS WINBOT W2S Omni Window Cleaning Robot, with 6-in-1 Multifunction Station, TruEdge Edge-to-Edge Precision, Triple Wide-Angle Spray Nozzles, 12-Level Safety System, Dual Power Modes
short_description: Deep Edge Cleaning with TruEdge Technology: Manual cleaning often misses window edges. This window cleaning robot uses TruEdge tech and 200 RPM pads to reach as close as 1.1 mm to corners, giving you a spotless, panoramic view with pro-level precision.

Automatic Pad Lift for Smarter Edge Control: Uneven edges make hand cleaning difficult. The window robot auto-detects frames, lowers the pad for edge scrubbing, then lifts it afterward for smooth, efficient cleaning without repeated passes.

3-Way Wide-Angle Spray for Tough Stains: Stubborn dirt is hard to dissolve manually. The upgraded 3-nozzle wide-angle spray boosts pressure by 100% and spray duration by 90%, helping the window cleaner robot wipe away dried stains in one go.

Dual Power Modes for Any Window Scenario: Outlets aren't always available. This window robot offers battery mode for balconies and bathrooms, providing up to 110 minutes of cordless cleaning, letting you reach more windows with full mobility.

Wired Mode for Continuous High-Coverage Cleaning: Large indoor windows need long runtime. Use wired mode to achieve uninterrupted operation, extending battery life and ensuring your window cleaning robot is always ready when you need it.
product_details: Special Feature Dual Power Modes, Dual Power Modes for Flexible Charging, TruEdge Technology
Item model number WINBOT W2S OMNI
Best Sellers Rank #36,593 in Home & Kitchen ( See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen ) #37 in Robotic Vacuums

name: ECOVACS WINBOT W2 PRO Omni Portable Window Cleaning Robot with Multi-Functional Station, Charging While Working, Intelligent Cleaning with Triple Nozzle Water Sprayer, 12-Level Protection
short_description: Dual Power Modes for Flexible Charging - WINBOT W2 PRO OMNI offers two power modes for flexible use: Battery mode and Plugged-in mode. Battery mode: Ideal for areas without outlets, like balconies or bathrooms, providing up to 110 minutes of cleaning , equivalent to 55 square meters of coverage on a full charge. Plugged-in mode: Perfect for large glass areas in rooms with sockets, allowing continuous cleaning. This feature extends battery life by preventing frequent full discharges, making it reliable even in critical, time-sensitive situations.

6-in-1 Multifunction Station - WINBOT W2 PRO OMNI introduced the state-of-the-art window cleaning station - an all-in-one multi-purpose attachment, which makes window cleaning more convenient, safe and easy to handle. It can serves as a control panel, changer, stabler and the portable storage room for your window cleaning task.

3 Nozzles Wide Angle Spray Technology - A fully upgraded 3 nozzles wide angle spray technology, together with the wet cloth ensure efficient and effective cleaning.The water pressure is increased by 100% with an improved function time of 90%, all dirt dissolves and is eliminated in one stroke.

Intelligent Path Planning Technology - The WINBOT W2 PRO OMNI has a brand-new upgraded brushless motor which, combined with WIN-SLAM 4.0 intelligent path planning, can increase cleaning efficiency by 30%. Through intelligent path planning, the cleaning pattern is optimised to enable efficient turning and enhanced edge detection, so it can adapt to a wide range of window types and scenarios – whether that's floor-to-ceiling, small-sized, frameless or tilting windows.

12-Stage Protection for Added Peace-of-Mind - With the 12-stage protection system from both hardware and software support, WINBOT W2 OMNI offers the highest level of window cleaning safety. ECOVACS stands firmly behind our product's safety. WINBOT W2 OMNI comes with insurance protection that offers financial security and worry

Unbeatable Cleaning Efficiency — The WINBOT W2 Family delivers a 30% boost in total cleaning efficiency, thanks to its built-in brushless motor and WIN-SLAM 4.0 Intelligent Planning algorithm. Precision edge detection, efficient turning, and meticulous edge cleaning ensure spotless windows every time.

5 Cleaning Modes for a Variety of Needs — The WINBOT W2 Family puts users in control with five customizable cleaning modes. Easily select or switch modes using the intuitive station panel or the ECOVACS HOME app for a tailored cleaning experience.

Intelligent Climbing with No More Slippage — The WINBOT W2 Family features an intelligent climbing system powered by an upgraded synchronous belt, highly resistant to water and friction. This system significantly improves stability and eliminates worries about slippage during operation.

short_description: 2000Pa Strong Suction & Dry in Seconds: Experience a streak-free shine with our ZRHI cordless window vacuum squeegee. The powerful 2000Pa suction instantly removes water and cleaning solution, leaving your windows, mirrors, and glass surfaces dry and crystal clear in just one pass.

2200mAh Long-Lasting Battery: Enjoy the convenience of a truly cordless electric window cleaner tool. The built-in 2200mAh rechargeable battery provides ample power for your entire cleaning session, allowing you to tackle multiple rooms without the hassle of frequent recharging.

150mL Detachable Tank: The ZRHI electric window washer squeegee features a transparent 150mL water tank that is easy to detach and empty. Its generous capacity means less interruption for emptying, making your cleaning of large surface areas like shower doors or big windows much more efficient.

280mm Extra-Wide Squeegee Blade: Cover more surface area with every swipe! The extra-wide 280mm suction head on this vacuum window squeegee ensures faster and more efficient cleaning on large glass panels, significantly reducing your overall cleaning time and effort.

Versatile for Multi-Surface Cleaning: This cordless window cleaning kit is your all-in-one solution for spotless smooth surfaces. It works perfectly on bathroom glass doors, windows, kitchen countertops, tiles, and even car windshields, eliminating the need for multiple cleaning tools.
